definition[0]: not caring or worrying about the possible bad or dangerous results of your actions
example[0]: He was accused of causing death by reckless driving.
example[2]: He ran into the burning house with reckless abandon  (=without caring about the danger).
definition[1]: not thinking or caring about the possible bad or dangerous results of your actions. In some cases someone’s actions may be illegal if a court decides they have been reckless
example[3]: He was fined £80 for reckless driving.
example[4]: The firm’s failure to detect reckless trading led to a $450 million trading loss.
